Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 23rd overall pick, by Pontiac in 1987...
Injured on 7/8/1988 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 7/3/1989 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Pontiac to Bay City on 7/31/1989 (Going to PON: 1B P. Ward. Going to BC: P T. Veasley, 2B P. Harker)...
Injured on 4/8/1990 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/16/1991 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 7/15/1991 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Had first career hit (triple) on 9/6/1991, off Harvey Shope (CC)...
Earned first career win on 9/6/1991...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1992, going 12-11, 3.15 ERA...
